column6:
"SECRET WAR" ARC CONCLUDES!,2005,6
Jessica makes a last-ditch effort to find the missing Luke Cage. But will she ever find him? Will her life ever recover from the drama of Secret War? This issue is wall-to-wall guest stars. We'd tell you who, but that would ruin the surprises.
Part 4 (of 4).
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:Michael Lark | penciller (cover):Mike Mayhew | colorist:Peter Pantazis | letterer:Cory Petit
